subject: issue with brake hydraulic on plus x pedals
description_text:
hi i was reaching out because i wanted to know what i should do or how i
can fix a hydraulic issue. the black and silver rod popped off the brake
pedal and now i t wont reach and screw back into the top or bottom, it will
fit in one or the other but if i try to get the rod into both ends of the
brake it seems like the rod is smaller and doesnt reach

conversations.body_text: Hi Adrian,    We apologize, but we didn't fully understand your question. Could you please describe it in more detail, preferably with pictures or videos.
